using UnityEngine;

namespace MTAssets.NativeAndroidToolkit
{
    /*
    * This script was generated by Native Android Toolkit Preferences and adds the Achievements,
    * Events and Leaderboards IDs from Play Games Resources.
    */

    [AddComponentMenu("")] //Hide this script in component menu.
    public class PlayGamesResources
    {
        //Achievements
        public enum Achievement { NONE %PLAY_GAMES_ACHIEVEMENTS_NAMES% };
        //Leaderboards
        public enum Leaderboard { NONE %PLAY_GAMES_LEADERBOARDS_NAMES% };
        //Events
        public enum Event { NONE %PLAY_GAMES_EVENTS_NAMES% };
    }

    [AddComponentMenu("")] //Hide this script in component menu.
    public class GPGSLowLevelResources
    {
        //Stores all google play games resources string ids
        public static string[] achievements = new string[] { "NONE" %PLAY_GAMES_ACHIEVEMENTS_IDs% };
        public static string[] leaderboards = new string[] { "NONE" %PLAY_GAMES_LEADERBOARDS_IDs% };
        public static string[] events = new string[] { "NONE" %PLAY_GAMES_EVENTS_IDs% };

        //Core methods

        public static string GetAchievementStringID(PlayGamesResources.Achievement achievementId)
        {
            return achievements[((int)achievementId)];
        }

        public static string GetLeaderboardStringID(PlayGamesResources.Leaderboard leaderboardId)
        {
            return leaderboards[((int)leaderboardId)];
        }

        public static string GetEventStringID(PlayGamesResources.Event eventId)
        {
            return events[((int)eventId)];
        }
    }
}
